onProvideAssistData(android.app.Activity.Description: This is called when the user is requesting an assist, to build a full @B_android#content#Intent#ACTION_ASSIST_E@ Intent with all of the context of the current application. You can override this method to place into the bundle anything you would like to appear in the @B_android#content#Intent#EXTRA_ASSIST_CONTEXT_E@ part of the assist Intent.
onProvideAssistData(android.app.Activity.FullName: public abstract void onProvideAssistData (Activity activity, Bundle data)

ClassDesc: Callback interface for use with @B_android#app#Application#registerOnProvideAssistDataListener_E@ and @B_android#app#Application#unregisterOnProvideAssistDataListener_E@.
